titleStmt.title: B. Taylor's Opuscula the measures of friendship : with additional tracts : to which is now added his moral demonstration proving that the religion of Jesus Christ is from God : never before printed in this volume.
Selections. 1678
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Jeremy, 1613-1667.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
